# Test fbd label command

fbd init --prefix test

# Create an issue
fbd create 'Issue for labels'
cp stdout issue.txt
exec sh -c 'grep -oE "test-[a-z0-9]+" issue.txt > id.txt'

# Add a label
exec sh -c 'fbd label add $(cat id.txt) backend'
stdout 'Added label'

# List labels
exec sh -c 'fbd label list $(cat id.txt)'
stdout 'backend'

# Add another label
exec sh -c 'fbd label add $(cat id.txt) urgent'

# Verify both labels
exec sh -c 'fbd label list $(cat id.txt)'
stdout 'backend'
stdout 'urgent'

# Remove a label
exec sh -c 'fbd label remove $(cat id.txt) urgent'

# Verify removal - should still have backend
exec sh -c 'fbd label list $(cat id.txt)'
stdout 'backend'

# List all unique labels
fbd label list-all
stdout 'backend'
